column3: Removed Integer.valueOf() boxing of literals whose type is detected as byte or short.
I'm slightly worried that you do setConstType inside isBoxingCall method, this looks like an invisible side effect. Please find a better place for it.
Please do not do setConstType inside isBoxingCall method

I removed setConstType() from isBoxingCall().
I also fixed another bug: narrowing cast was not applied when target type was Byte or Short.

On top of that I removed the unboxing calls too. (intValue(), etc.)
This should have probably been done in a separate PR, but I couldn't resist.
Fixed conflicts after recent changes in master
Updated TestPrimitives test to match the source
Removed setConstType() from is isBoxingCall() to avoid hidden side ef¡­
Omit unnecessary unboxing calls in decompiled code
